subject: Re: Gateway MT6451
body:
Please don't top post, and please reply to the list, not to me.

Ok! I didn't know about top posting, and made a brief search about it so I ask you pardon for my mistake.

I don't know much about sound, so I'll leave that for other listmembers. There's kernel support for some TI mmc/sd readers (see Device
drivers/Misc devices and Device drivers/MMC / SD Card support) but Ihave no experience with it. A quick google for "Broadcom Dell 1390wireless" indicates that it's a rebranded Broadcom 43xx chip, so it
might work with the (in mainline kernel) bcm43xx driver. It shouldcertainly work with ndiswrapper.
I will try to make my wireless card work with this driver.
I work with multimedia so I need the sound working, I will try to make it work with Etch until have success :D

Thanks for your help!
